subject: MCOM
name: Storytelling for Business
fullname: Presentation Skills and Storytelling for Business
info:
Memo writing, oral presentations, and team communication required of HR professional. Emphasizes hands-on, experiential learning, including videotaping.

prereq: HRIR student

subject: MCOM
name: Executive Image Communications
fullname: Enhancing Your Executive Image in Business Communications
info: Techniques to project executive presence in all business communications.prereq: MBA student

subject: MCOM
name: Persuasive Writing in Business
info:
Writing to motivate/affect change. Form/content. Techniques of persuasion.  Producing polished text. Writing with power.

prereq: MBA student

subject: MCOM
name: Pers Writing in Bus:Non-Native
fullname: Persuasive Writing in Business: Non-Native Speakers of English
info: Writing to motivate/affect change. Form/content, techniques of persuasion.  Producing polished text. Writing with power.

subject: MCOM
name: Strat, Skills for Mgrl Present
fullname: Strategies and Skills for Managerial Presentations
info:
Delivering key messages with clarity/confidence, regardless of audience or setting. Maximizing impact as a speaker, seated/standing. Personal communication style and audience. Tailoring message. Handling questions/answers. Using audio/visual tools. Presenting as a team.

prereq: MBA or Mgmt Science MBA student

subject: MCOM
name: Mgrl Presentations:Non-Native
fullname: Strategies and Skills for Managerial Presentations: Non-Native Speakers of English
info: Delivering key messages with clarity/confidence, regardless of audience or setting. Maximizing impact as a speaker, seated/standing. Personal communication style and audience. Tailoring message. Handling questions/answers. Using audio/visual tools. Presenting as a team.
